description:
As a language learner
  I want to hear the pronunciation of words
  So that I can learn correct pronunciation

elements.name: Audio buttons are visible on word cards

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Audio Test" exists
I click on the list "Audio Test"
I add a word "bonjour" with translation "안녕하세요"
I should see the audio button for word "bonjour" in language 1
I should see the audio button for word "bonjour" in language 2
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Audio Lang1" exists
I click on the list "Audio Lang1"
I add a word "merci" with translation "감사합니다"
I click the audio button for word "merci" in language 1
the audio should play without error
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Audio Lang2" exists
I click on the list "Audio Lang2"
I add a word "salut" with translation "안녕"
I click the audio button for word "salut" in language 2
the audio should play without error

elements.name: Audio button is visible in quiz

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Quiz Audio" exists
I click on the list "Quiz Audio"
I add a word "oui" with translation "네"
I navigate back
I start the quiz for list "Quiz Audio"
I should see the quiz audio button
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Quiz Audio Play" exists
I click on the list "Quiz Audio Play"
I add a word "non" with translation "아니요"
I navigate back
I start the quiz for list "Quiz Audio Play"
I click the quiz audio button
the audio should play without error

name: Audio Playback

description:
As a language learner
  I want to delete vocabulary lists I no longer need
  So that I can keep my app organized

elements.name: Delete a list via long press

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "To Delete" exists
I long press on the list "To Delete"
I should see the delete list confirmation dialog
I confirm the list deletion
I should not see the list "To Delete" on the home screen
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Keep This" exists
I long press on the list "Keep This"
I cancel the list deletion
I should see the list "Keep This" on the home screen

name: Delete Vocabulary List

description:
As a user
  I want to see helpful messages when there's no content
  So that I know what to do next

elements.name: Empty home screen shows helpful message

steps.name: the app is launched
there are no vocabulary lists
I am on the home screen
I should see the empty home screen message
I should see the create list call to action

elements.name: Empty list detail shows helpful message

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Empty List" exists
I click on the list "Empty List"
I should see the empty list message
I should see the add word call to action

name: Empty States

description:
As a user
  I want to navigate through the app
  So that I can access different features

elements.name: Navigate to list detail and back

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Navigation Test" exists
I click on the list "Navigation Test"
I should be on the list detail page
I navigate back
I should be on the home screen
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "List One" exists
a vocabulary list "List Two" exists
I click on the list "List One"
I should be on the list detail page
I navigate back
I click on the list "List Two"
I should be on the list detail page
I navigate back
I should be on the home screen

name: App Navigation

description:
As a language learner
  I want to practice vocabulary with quizzes
  So that I can memorize words effectively

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Quiz List" exists
I click on the list "Quiz List"
I add a word "test" with translation "테스트"
I navigate back
I start the quiz for list "Quiz List"
I should be on the quiz screen
I should see a word to translate
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Correct Answer" exists
I click on the list "Correct Answer"
I add a word "bonjour" with translation "안녕하세요"
I navigate back
I start the quiz for list "Correct Answer"
I enter the correct answer for "bonjour" and "안녕하세요"
I submit my answer
I should see correct feedback
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Wrong Answer" exists
I click on the list "Wrong Answer"
I add a word "merci" with translation "감사합니다"
I navigate back
I start the quiz for list "Wrong Answer"
I enter the answer "wrong answer"
I submit my answer
I should see incorrect feedback

elements.name: Complete a quiz and see results

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Complete Quiz" exists
I click on the list "Complete Quiz"
I add a word "oui" with translation "네"
I navigate back
I start the quiz for list "Complete Quiz"
I complete the quiz
I should see the quiz results dialog

name: Quiz Mode

description: Basic smoke test to verify Appium Flutter Driver connection

elements.name: Launch app and verify home screen

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
the home screen should be displayed

name: Smoke Test

description:
As a language learner
  I want to manage my vocabulary lists
  So that I can organize words I'm learning

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
I should see the page title "Mes Listes"
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
I click the add list button
I should see the create list dialog
I enter list name "French Basics"
I click the create button
I should see the list "French Basics" on the home screen
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
I click the add list button
I enter list name "Temporary List"
I click the cancel button
I should not see the list "Temporary List" on the home screen

name: Vocabulary List Management

description:
As a language learner
  I want to add and manage words in my vocabulary lists
  So that I can build my vocabulary

elements.name: Add a word to a list

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Word Test" exists
I click on the list "Word Test"
I should be on the list detail page
I click the add word button
I should see the add word dialog
I enter the French word "bonjour"
I enter the Korean word "안녕하세요"
I click the add word confirm button
I should see the word "bonjour" in the word list
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Cancel Test" exists
I click on the list "Cancel Test"
I click the add word button
I enter the French word "temporaire"
I cancel adding the word
I should not see the word "temporaire" in the word list

elements.name: Delete a word from a list

steps.name: the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Delete Word Test" exists
I click on the list "Delete Word Test"
I add a word "supprimer" with translation "삭제"
I should see the word "supprimer" in the word list
I click the delete button for word "supprimer"
I should see the delete word confirmation dialog
I confirm the word deletion
I should not see the word "supprimer" in the word list
the app is launched
I am on the home screen
a vocabulary list "Keep Word Test" exists
I click on the list "Keep Word Test"
I add a word "garder" with translation "유지"
I click the delete button for word "garder"
I cancel the word deletion
I should see the word "garder" in the word list

name: Word Management
